document.full_text: the bus that crashed last month on a new york highway killing 15 passengers was speeding at 78 miles per hour just before the accident, according to a preliminary federal report released on friday.
document.title: bus in bronx crash was speeding just before accident
lines_and_colors: the bus that crashed last month on a new york highway killing 15 passengers was speeding at 78 miles per hour just before the accident, according to a preliminary federal report released on friday.
